title: 84/377/EEC: Commission Decision of 6 July 1984 determining the world market price for peas and field beans referred to in Article 3 (2) of Regulation (EEC) No 1431/82
header:
COMMISSION  DECISION
of 6 July 1984
determining the world market price for peas and field beans referred to in Article 3 (2) of Regulation (EEC) No 1431/82
(84/377/EEC)
THE COMMISSION OF THE EUROPEAN
COMMUNITIES
main_body: The world market price referred to in Article 2 of Regulation (EEC) No 2036/82 shall be 27 ECU per 100 kilograms.

This Decision is addressed to the Member States.
It shall apply with effect from 1 July 1984.
attachments:
Done at Brussels, 6 July 1984.
For the Commission
Poul DALSAGER
Member of the Commission
